item.title: Send Email to 3rd Party from SCSM Console – PowerShell and Console Task
item.description: So recently, I had a customer ask me for the following as their previous incident management system had this functionality. The customer wanted to be able to send an “Update Email” to a 3rd party from the SCSM Console with automatically placing the reference number into said email. They needed the functionality of sending to any email address. This was a requirement for the type of business they are in.
